And it seems like nothing could have stopped the fire because here it's very hot, it's very dry, and it's windy at some moments which makes you know all these conditions make the flames even bigger and spread even easier and this is a situation like in 80 percent of the territory here in Greece because of the wind the fumes are spread throughout the country as far as 950 kilometers to the southwest reaching Italian islands, which is very difficult to breathe and some beach goers when they go to the beach, when they lay to sunbathe, when they see up, they see ash coming from the sky.

sentences.sentence: But we will stay on the ground and cover really this devastation, which has covered more than 400,000 acres here in Greece. Der frühere US-Präsident Donald Trump will sich im Bezirksgefängnis von Atlanta den Behörden stellen.
